content: here s a simple and quick retro headband/headwrap that you can wear 2 different ways this uses simple stitches and just a small amount of cotton yarn hope you like this headband and make lots for yourself and/or friends if you have any questions or need further assistance let me know and i will help you thanks for looking happy crocheting eta i have been informed that hl i love this cotton works up slightly smaller than handicrafter or sugar and cream so you might want to go up a hook size or two
